title: Releases
body:
> #### Below you can find a basic summary of InterTrader releases, with links to the release pages.

* ### [v1.0.0: Major update contain several new features](/releases/v1-0-0/ "v1.0.0")
* ### v0.1.0: UI improvements and bug fixes on the comparison page
* ### v0.0.1: First release of InterTrader
